req.name: post
req.description: Identifier of the Post to unlike. Resolved via route-model binding: for API (JSON) requests this is the numeric id, for web requests this is the post slug.

200.description:
Successful removal of like.
- Web (HTML/Turbo Streams): Returns a Turbo Stream response (text/vnd.turbo-stream.html) containing two <turbo-stream> actions: one replacing the like button/fragment (dom_id($post, 'like')) and one updating the likes count (dom_id($post, 'likes_count')).
- API (application/json): Returns a JSON array of the deleted Like objects.

schema.description: Response body. For web requests this is Turbo Stream XML (text/vnd.turbo-stream.html). For API requests JSON array is returned; an example is provided in the examples field.

examples.text/vnd.turbo-stream.html:
<turbo-stream action="replace" target="post_1_like">
  <template>
    <!-- rendered likes._like view for post id 1 -->
    <form action="/posts/1/likes" method="POST" class="form-inline">
      <button type="submit">Like</button>
    </form>
  </template>
</turbo-stream>
<turbo-stream action="update" target="post_1_likes_count">
  <template>0</template>
</turbo-stream>
